items.title: Classic Mac
items.description: Homeroom’s super creamy and extra cheesy remake of the all-cheddar mac you ate as a kid.

items.title: Gilroy Garlic Mac
items.description: Creamy gouda, sharp pecorino, and just the right amount of garlic.

items.title: Mexican Mac
items.description: Niman Ranch chorizo, jack cheese, homemade chipotle adobo sauce, and cilantro, served with a wedge of lime.

items.title: Smoky Bacon Mac
items.description: Rich and bold with smoked cheddar, jack cheese, and bacon.

items.title: Secret Menu: Breakfast Mac
items.description: Caviar exclusive. Breakfast Mac: classic mac with bacon and egg with side of a biscuit.

items.title: Secret Menu: Eggy Bacon Sprouts
items.description: Caviar Exclusive. Roasted brussels sprouts with bacon, topped with a fried egg.

items.title: Secret Menu: (Vegetarian) Eggy Sprouts
items.description: Caviar exclusive. Roasted brussels sprouts, topped with a fried egg.

items.title: Classic Heat+Eat
items.description: The delicious mac you know and love, delivered half-baked now for dinner later or lunch tomorrow! Includes heating instructions.

items.title: White Cheddar Heat+Eat
items.description: The delicious mac you know and love, delivered half-baked now for dinner later or lunch tomorrow! Includes heating instructions.

items.title: Jalapeño Popper Heat+Eat
items.description: The delicious mac you know and love, delivered half-baked now for dinner later or lunch tomorrow! Includes heating instructions.

items.title: Gilroy Heat+Eat
items.description: The delicious mac you know and love, delivered half-baked now for dinner later or lunch tomorrow! Includes heating instructions.

items.title: Heat+Eat Roasted Brussels Sprouts with Bacon
items.description: Delivered partially cooked now for dinner later! Made with a tasty apple cider vinaigrette.

items.title: Heat+Eat Roasted Brussels Sprouts (Vegetarian)
items.description: Delivered partially cooked now for dinner later! Made with a tasty apple cider vinaigrette.

items.title: Classic Mac
items.description: Homeroom’s super creamy and extra cheesy remake of the all-cheddar mac you ate as a kid.

items.title: Gilroy Garlic Mac
items.description: Creamy gouda, sharp pecorino, and just the right amount of garlic.

items.title: Mexican Mac
items.description: Niman Ranch chorizo, jack cheese, homemade chipotle adobo sauce, and cilantro, served with a wedge of lime.

items.title: Smoky Bacon Mac
items.description: Rich and bold with smoked cheddar, jack cheese, and bacon.

items.title: Sriracha Mac
items.description: Creamy gouda, ginger butter, scallions, and spicy sriracha.

items.title: Hawaiian Mac
items.description: Sweet and salty! Creamy havarti cheese, bacon, scallions, and pineapple.

items.title: Buffalo Chicken Mac
items.description: Tangy, spicy Frank's buffalo sauce, grilled chicken, scallions, and cheddar and jack cheeses.

items.title: Mac the Goat
items.description: Rich and tangy with fresh chevre, sliced scallions, crispy breadcrumbs, and a drizzle of olive oil.

items.title: Jalapeño Popper Mac
items.description: Sharp cheddar, cream cheese, chopped peppers, and crispy breadcrumbs. Just like a jalapeño popper.

items.title: White Cheddar Mac
items.description: Our creamiest, sharpest mac made with velvety aged white cheddar.

items.title: Macximus
items.description: Greek-style mac with artichoke hearts, spinach, shallots, and feta.

items.title: Vegan Mac
items.description: Rich, creamy and cheese-less. Sure to please even the biggest cheese fanatics. Made with nutritional yeast, soy milk, tofu, a touch of soy sauce, and a few tasty spices.

items.title: Trailer Mac
items.description: Cheddary mac with Niman Ranch hot dog, topped with crushed potato chips.

items.title: Italian Sausage Mac
items.description: Creamy gouda and nutty pecorino cheese with all natural Italian sausage, sweet caramelized onions, and cherry tomatoes.

items.title: Chicken Bacon Ranch Mac
items.description: The winner of our recent mac madness competition, this flavor-bomb has long been a staff secret! Made with sharp cheddar and jack cheese, grilled chicken, crispy bacon, and of course, a big hit of ranch both in it, and on top of its crispy breadcrumb crust, this mac's a drool worthy pick, and beat the competition by a landslide.

items.title: Four Cheese Mac
items.description: Four cheeses? This mac is the cheesiest there ever was: with provolone, gorgonzola, pecorino, and mozzarella. It's melty, flavorful, well, and pretty darn cheesy.

items.title: Kid's Cheddar Mac
items.description: A pint-sized mac for pint-sized people! Just a smaller version of Homeroom’s super creamy and extra cheesy remake of the all-cheddar mac you ate as a kid.

items.title: Kid's Jack Mac
items.description: A pint-sized mac for pint-sized people! Made with mild jack cheese.

items.title: Kids Butter and Peas Mac
items.description: A pint-sized mac for pint-sized people! Just pasta with a little butter and some fresh green peas.

items.title: Spicy Cauliflower
items.description: Roasted and smothered in paprika, pecorino, and crushed red pepper. Cannot be vegan.

items.title: Roasted Brussels Sprouts with Bacon
items.description: Made with a tasty apple cider vinaigrette.

items.title: Roasted Brussels Sprouts (Vegetarian)
items.description: Made with a tasty apple cider vinaigrette.

items.title: Minty Buttery Peas
items.description: With a touch of garlic and fresh mint.

items.title: Broccoli and Ranch
items.description: Served chilled, with our homemade ranch dressing.

items.title: Biscuit and Honey Butter
items.description: Homemade buttermilk biscuit, served with honey butter on the side.

items.title: Big Hearty Salad
items.description: A big bowl of organic mixed greens, perfect for sharing. Served with a choice of homemade dressing on the side: creamy ranch, balsamic, or citrus vinaigrette.

items.title: Early Summer Pickled Veggies
items.description: Fresh and crunchy house-pickled asparagus, carrots, onions, and cauliflower. An i-dill side if you're looking for a little zing to go alongside your mac!

items.title: Side Salad
items.description: Organic mixed greens with a side of homemade dressing: creamy ranch, balsamic, or citrus vinaigrette.

items.title: Freshman Salad
items.description: Mixed greens, kalamata olives, feta, and artichoke hearts. Served with a choice of homemade dressing on the side: creamy ranch, balsamic, or citrus vinaigrette.

items.title: Sophomore Salad
items.description: Mixed greens, grilled chicken, goat cheese, and tomatoes. Served with a choice of homemade dressing on the side: creamy ranch, balsamic, or citrus vinaigrette.

items.title: Junior Salad
items.description: Mixed greens, chickpeas, broccoli, scallions, and walnuts. Served with a choice of homemade dressing on the side: creamy ranch, balsamic, or citrus vinaigrette.

items.title: Homemade Oreo
items.description: Topped with sea salt.

items.title: Brownie
items.description: Big and super fudgy.

items.title: Creamy Peanut Butter Pie
items.description: With a graham cracker crust.

items.title: Grasshopper Pie
items.description: Mint chocolate chip ice cream in a chocolate cookie crust, drizzled with homemade chocolate sauce.

items.title: Banana Creme Pie
items.description: Layers of homemade pudding and caramel with fresh bananas and vanilla wafers. Banana cream pie comes in a convenient plastic cup.

items.title: Vegan Gluten-Free Brownie
items.description: Delicious, rich brownie from the Inspired Cookie Co.

items.title: Homeroom Mac and Cheese Cookbook
items.description: Two years and thousands of macs later, we’ve turned our expertise into an awesome cookbook from Ten Speed press.

items.title: Beer Koozies
items.description: To have and to hold...and to keep your beer cold!

items.title: Small Classic Mac Platter
items.description: All of our macs can be made into a platter, and you can customize it with any of our tasty add-ons. Small platters will easily feed 4-6 people, while our hefty large platters are perfect for parties of up to 10.

items.title: Honor Roll Sampler Platter
items.description: Classic Mac, Smoky Bacon Mac, and Gilroy Garlic Mac.

items.title: Veggie Sampler Platter
items.description: Mac the Goat, Macximus, and White Cheddar Mac.

items.title: Meat Sampler Platter
items.description: Trailer Mac, Gilroy Garlic Mac, and Smoky Bacon Mac.

items.title: Spicy Sampler Platter
items.description: Jalapeño Popper Mac, Sriracha Mac, and Mexican Mac. Please note that the Mexican Mac contains chorizo.

items.title: Spicy Cauliflower Platter
items.description: Roasted and smothered in paprika, pecorino, and crushed red pepper. Cannot be vegan; serves 10 as a side dish.

items.title: Roasted Brussels Sprouts with Bacon Platter
items.description: Made with a tasty apple cider vinaigrette. Serves 10 as a side dish.

items.title: Roasted Brussels Sprouts Platter (Vegetarian)
items.description: Made with a tasty apple cider vinaigrette. Serves 10 as a side dish.

items.title: Minty Buttery Peas Platter
items.description: With a touch of garlic and fresh mint. Serves 10 as a side dish.

items.title: Broccoli and Ranch Platter
items.description: Steamed broccoli served chilled, with a side our homemade ranch dressing for dipping! Serves 10 as a side dish.

items.title: Salad Platter
items.description: A big platter of organic mixed greens. Comes with a choice of homemade dressing on the side: creamy ranch, balsamic, or citrus vinaigrette. Serves 10 as a side dish.

items.title: Lunchbox Combo
items.description: Little mac, salad with dressing on side, and homemade oreo combo.
